english.segment1: Locked inside this cell of flesh. I sat awaiting an eminent death. The fruitful labor of my sin. Had brought me to what I knew would be the end
english.segment2: When I had a debt I couldn't pay. You paid a debt I didn't owe. You gave your life for me that day. So freedom I could know
english.segment3: Set me free. From the chains that bound me to my sin. Set me free. From this life that I've been living. Set me free
english.segment4: There has never been a time. When Your mercy did not find me. Tangled up in all my sin. And then so faithfully unwind me
english.segment5: But just before I slipped away. You heard me when I called Your name. There'll never be a day when You won't come and
english.segment6: You are the author and the finisher of the faith in me. I know I can trust in You to come and set me free
